title: N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 12 ยง 263.104 - Powers and duties of the arbitrator and conduct of the arbitration proceeding
content:
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 12 ยง 263.104 - Powers and duties of the arbitrator and conduct of the arbitration proceeding

State Regulations
A neutral arbitrator has the powers and duties set forth
in section 702-b (c)(ii) through (iv) of SERA. The conduct of the arbitration
proceedings shall be under the exclusive jurisdiction and control of the
arbitrator. The conduct of the arbitrator shall conform to applicable
law. Notes
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 12
ยง
263.104

Adopted

New

York State Register February 15, 2023/Volume XLV, Issue 07, eff. 2/15/2023

State regulations are updated quarterly; we currently have two versions available. Below is a
comparison between our most recent version and the prior quarterly release. More comparison features will be added as we have more versions to compare. No prior version found.
